Unnamed: 5: We set ourself an ambitious annual RICI target, lower than previous years. Our performance against RICI continues on a downward trend, despite underperformance in FY23. While we have made good progress on our road safety action plan activities, we have seen many challenges post-pandemic, including an increase in road deaths across the broader network in Australia and North America, which is understood to be related to changes in driver behaviour and travel patterns. We continue to work with Government and Industry to address these challenges.
